mapper.select:
select count(*) from T_COOPERATION_PROFIT t where 1=1
and t.recoder like '%${recoder}%'
and t.organ_id = '${organ_id}'
and t.organcode like '%${organcode}%'
and t.recodertime >=to_date('${recordTimeBegin}','yyyy-mm-dd')
and t.recodertime <=to_date('${recordTimeEnd}','yyyy-mm-dd')
select profitid from T_COOPERATION_PROFIT t where 1=1 and t.organ_id = '${organ_id}' and t.yearmonth = '${yearmonth}' and t.sourcecode = '${sourcecode}' FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
